languages.text: "Пока Архивраг строит козни против служителей Его по всему Простору, мы вынуждены ждать заверения какой-то бумажки!" {n}Арджента бросает гневный взгляд на Джай.{/n} "И вовсе не ради блага Империума, нет, ради удовлетворения еретички!"

traits.locale_text: "Пока Архивраг строит козни против служителей Его повсему Простору, мы вынуждене ждать заверение какой-то бумажки!" {n}Арджента бросает гневный взгляд на Джай.{/n} "И вовсе не ради блага Империума, нет, ради удовлетворение еретички!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"
languages.original_text: "Пока Архивраг строит козни против служителей Его по всему Простору, мы вынуждены ждать заверения какой-то бумажки!" {n}Арджента бросает гневный взгляд на Джай.{/n} "И вовсе не ради блага Империума, нет, ради удовлетворения еретички!"

traits.locale_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “混沌大敌正在整个科罗努斯扩区策划阴谋，准备对付神皇的追随者，可我们却不得不在这里等待一纸凭证！”{n}阿洁塔愤怒地瞪着婕伊。{/n}“而且，这么做还不是为了帝国的利益，不是！而是为了满足某个异端分子的异想天开！”
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"

traits.locale_text: “混沌大敌正在整个科罗努斯扩区策划阴谋，准备对付神皇的追随者，可我们却不得不在这里等待一纸凭证！”{n}阿洁塔愤怒地瞪着婕伊。{/n}“而且，这么做还不是为了帝国的利益，不是！而是为了满足某个异端分子的异想天开！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «El Archienemigo urde planes contra Sus sirvientes por toda la Extensión, ¡y nosotros tenemos que esperar aquí a que certifiquen un papel!». {n}Argenta lanza una mirada furibunda a Jae.{/n} «Y no por el bien del Imperium, no, ¡sino para satisfacer el capricho de una hereje!».
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"

traits.locale_text: «El Archienemigo urde planes contra Sus sirvientes por toda la Extensión, ¡y nosotros tenemos que esperar aquí a que certifiquen un papel!». {n}Argenta lanza una mirada furibunda a Jae.{/n} «Y no por el bien del Imperium, no, ¡sino para satisfacer el capricho de una hereje!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「渾沌の勢力はエクスパンス中に広がる彼の従者に対して陰謀を企てているというのに、紙一枚の証明をもらうために、私たちはここに足止めされるだと！」{n}アルジェンタは怒りの眼差しをジェイに向ける。{/n}「断じて帝国のためにならない、気まぐれな異端者が満足するだけだ！」
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"

traits.locale_text: 「渾沌の勢力はエクスパンス中に広がる彼の従者に対して陰謀を企てているというのに、紙一枚の証明をもらうために、私たちはここに足止めされるだと！」{n}アルジェンタは怒りの眼差しをジェイに向ける。{/n}「断じて帝国のためにならない、気まぐれな異端者が満足するだけだ！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Le Grand Ennemi complote contre Ses serviteurs à travers l'ensemble des Étendues, et nous perdons notre temps à faire antichambre pour certifier un vulgaire bout de papier ! {n}s'exclame Argenta en lançant un regard noir à Jae.{/n} Non pas dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium, mais pour assouvir les caprices d'une hérétique ! »
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"

traits.locale_text: « Le Grand Ennemi complote contre Ses serviteurs à travers l'ensemble des Étendues, et nous perdons notre temps à faire antichambre pour certifier un vulgaire bout de papier ! {n}s'exclame Argenta en lançant un regard noir à Jae.{/n} Non pas dans l'intérêt de l'Imperium, mais pour assouvir les caprices d'une hérétique ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Der Erzfeind schmiedet überall in der Ausdehnung Pläne gegen Seine Diener, und wir müssen hier darauf warten, dass ein Stück Papier zertifiziert wird!" {n}Argenta wirft Jae einen wütenden Blick zu.{/n} "Und das nicht einmal für das Wohl des Imperiums, nein, sondern um die Launen einer Ketzerin zu befriedigen!"
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"

traits.locale_text: "Der Erzfeind schmiedet überall in der Ausdehnung Pläne gegen Seine Diener, und wir müssen hier darauf warten, dass ein Stück Papier zertifiziert wird!" {n}Argenta wirft Jae einen wütenden Blick zu.{/n} "Und das nicht einmal für das Wohl des Imperiums, nein, sondern um die Launen einer Ketzerin zu befriedigen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Şerbaşı, Enginlik'te O'nun hizmetkârlarına karşı komplolar kurarken biz burada bir parça kâğıdın tasdik edilmesini beklemek zorunda tutuluyoruz!" {n}Argenta, Jae'a kızgın bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'un yararına da değil, kâfir heves etti diye!"
languages.original_text: "The Archenemy is plotting against His servants throughout the Expanse, and we are forced to wait here for a piece of paper to be certified!" {n}Argenta tosses a furious look at Jae.{/n} "And not for the good of the Imperium, no, but to satisfy the whim of a heretic!"

traits.locale_text: "Şerbaşı, Enginlik'te O'nun hizmetkârlarına karşı komplolar kurarken biz burada bir parça kâğıdın tasdik edilmesini beklemek zorunda tutuluyoruz!" {n}Argenta, Jae'a kızgın bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "İmparatorluk'un yararına da değil, kâfir heves etti diye!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
